fields.plot: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the US-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.
fields.title: Captain Phillips

fields.plot: The Man of Steel faces off against the Dark Knight.
fields.title: Batman vs. Superman

fields.plot: A younger and more reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out on an
to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of Dwarves to reclaim their stolen mountain home from a dragon named Smaug.
fields.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey

fields.plot: A jet pilot gets stranded in space, and must unite a diverse team of aliens to form a squad capable of defeating cosmic threats.
fields.title: Guardians of the Galaxy

fields.plot: A Phoenix secretary steals 40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
fields.title: Psycho

fields.plot: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after he breaks parole, agrees to care for factory worker Fantine's daughter, Cosette. The fateful decision changes their lives forever.
fields.title: Les Misérables

fields.plot: Three teenage friends, in the ultimate act of independence, decide to spend their summer building a house in the woods and living off the land.
fields.title: The Kings of Summer

fields.plot: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? An infinity of possibilities rise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.
fields.title: Mr. Nobody

fields.plot: The plot is unknown at this time.
fields.title: Jurassic World

fields.plot: A dramatic thriller based on real events, THE FIFTH ESTATE reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.
fields.title: The Fifth Estate

fields.plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat, expecting to be married to a rich claimant by her mother, falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
fields.title: Titanic

fields.plot: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.
fields.title: The Incredibles

fields.plot: A witch conspires to teach important lessons to various characters of popular children's stories including Little Red Riding Hood, Cinderella, Jack and the Beanstalk and Rapunzel.
fields.title: Into the Woods

fields.plot: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
fields.title: Pulp Fiction

fields.plot: When a veteran 911 operator takes a life-altering call from a teenage girl who has just been abducted, she realizes that she must confront a killer from her past in order to save the girl's life.
fields.title: The Call

fields.plot: A young woman's world unravels when a drug prescribed by her psychiatrist has unexpected side effects.
fields.title: Side Effects

fields.plot: The true story of Richard Kuklinski, the notorious contract killer and family man. When finally arrested in 1986, neither his wife nor daughters have any clue about his real profession.
fields.title: The Iceman

fields.plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.
fields.title: The Wizard of Oz

fields.plot: A recounting of Jack Kerouac's (here known by the name of his fictional alter-ego Jack Duluoz) three sojourns to the cabin in Big Sur, owned by poet Lawrence Ferlinghetti.
fields.title: Big Sur

fields.plot: Five high school students, all different stereotypes, meet in detention, where they pour their hearts out to each other, and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.
fields.title: The Breakfast Club

fields.plot: A skilled extractor is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a task considered to be impossible.
fields.title: Inception

fields.plot: A love story between influential filmmaker Alfred Hitchcock and wife Alma Reville during the filming of [link=tt0054215] in 1959.
fields.title: Hitchcock

fields.plot: The third installment of the action-adventure franchise that follows the exploits of Barney Ross, Lee Christmas, and their associates.
fields.title: The Expendables 3

fields.plot: When Wolverine is summoned to Japan by an old acquaintance, he is embroiled in a conflict that forces him to confront his own demons.
fields.title: The Wolverine

fields.plot: A family is held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legalized.
fields.title: The Purge

fields.plot: A young woman with a mysterious past lands in Southport, North Carolina where her bond with a widower forces her to confront the dark secret that haunts her.
fields.title: Safe Haven

fields.plot: An introvert freshman is taken under the wings of two seniors who welcome him to the real world.
fields.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

fields.plot: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful, time-traveling Romulan creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.
fields.title: Star Trek

fields.plot: A look at Niall, Zayn, Liam, Louis, and Harry's meteoric rise to fame, from their humble hometown beginnings and competing on the X-Factor, to conquering the world and performing at London's famed O2 Arena.
fields.title: One Direction: This Is Us

fields.plot: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.
fields.title: Cloud Atlas

fields.plot: Harry, Ron and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord.
fields.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

fields.plot: A drama centered on two childhood friends who plan to rob an armored car depository, and the NYPD officer who stands in their way.
fields.title: Empire State

fields.plot: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.
fields.title: The Frozen Ground

fields.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stockbroker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.
fields.title: The Wolf of Wall Street

fields.plot: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.
fields.title: Thor

fields.plot: A writer who is brutalized during her cabin retreat seeks revenge on her attackers, who left her for dead.
fields.title: I Spit on Your Grave

fields.plot: A poor and passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman and gives her a sense of freedom. They soon are separated by their social differences.
fields.title: The Notebook

fields.plot: A romantic comedy that brings together three disparate characters who are learning to face a challenging and often confusing world as they struggle together against a common demon: sex addiction.
fields.title: Thanks for Sharing

fields.plot: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent 30 years into the past, where a hired gun awaits. Someone like Joe, who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by transporting back Joe's future self.
fields.title: Looper

fields.plot: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical nice girl.
fields.title: The Spectacular Now

fields.plot: An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.
fields.title: The Heat

fields.plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.
fields.title: Inglourious Basterds

fields.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
fields.title: The Godfather

fields.plot: A bipolar, bigoted junkie cop manipulates and hallucinates his way through the festive season in a bid to secure promotion and win back his wife and daughter.
fields.title: Filth

fields.plot: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker and they form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more...
fields.title: Fight Club

fields.plot: In a world of fake castles and anthropomorphic rodents, an epic battle begins when an unemployed father's sanity is challenged by a chance encounter with two underage girls on holiday.
fields.title: Escape from Tomorrow

fields.plot: A young, abused and timid 17-year-old girl discovers she has telekinesis, and gets pushed to the limit on the night of her school's prom by a humiliating prank.
fields.title: Carrie

fields.plot: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.
fields.title: Enough Said

fields.plot: A team of explorers discover a clue to the origins of mankind on Earth, leading them on a journey to the darkest corners of the universe. There, they must fight a terrifying battle to save the future of the human race.
fields.title: Prometheus

fields.plot: An undercover state cop who has infiltrated an Irish gang and a mole in the police force working for the same mob race to track down and identify each other before being exposed to the enemy, after both sides realize their outfit has a rat.
fields.title: The Departed

fields.plot: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.
fields.title: Dumb & Dumber

fields.plot: When the star-crossed lovers of two enemy families meet, forbidden love ensues.
fields.title: Romeo and Juliet

fields.plot: The most delicious event since macaroni met cheese. Inspired by the beloved children's book, the film focuses on a town where food falls from the sky like rain.
fields.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs

fields.plot: A look at the New York City punk-rock scene and the venerable nightclub, CBGB.
fields.title: CBGB

fields.plot: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.
fields.title: The Counselor

fields.plot: A murder in 1944 draws together the great poets of the beat generation: Allen Ginsberg, Jack Kerouac and William Burroughs.
fields.title: Kill Your Darlings

fields.plot: Julian, a drug-smuggler thriving in Bangkok's criminal underworld, sees his life get even more complicated when his mother compels him to find and kill whoever is responsible for his brother's recent death.
fields.title: Only God Forgives

fields.plot: Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods. The evil presence possesses them until only one is left to fight for survival.
fields.title: Evil Dead

fields.plot: An acclaimed writer, his ex-wife, and their teenaged children come to terms with the complexities of love in all its forms over the course of one tumultuous year.
fields.title: Stuck in Love

fields.plot: 86-year-old Irving Zisman is on a journey across America with the most unlikely companion: his 8 year-old grandson, Billy.
fields.title: Bad Grandpa

fields.plot: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.
fields.title: You're Next

fields.plot: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a super-hero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.
fields.title: Kick-Ass

fields.plot: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.
fields.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love.

fields.plot: King Leonidas and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.
An vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to get his revenge on the evil warlord who attacked his village and murdered his father when he was a boy.
fields.title: Conan the Barbarian

fields.plot: Tensions rise between lifelong friends Mitchell and Carter after their truck breaks down on an isolated desert road as they start to attack each other's life decisions with unwavering brutality.
fields.title: Scenic Route

fields.plot: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader [link=nm1136915] after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L. Team 6 in May 2011.
fields.title: Zero Dark Thirty

fields.plot: A continuation of the saga created by George Lucas.
fields.title: Star Wars: Episode VII

fields.plot: In 1921, England is overwhelmed by the loss and grief of World War I. Hoax exposer Florence Cathcart visits a boarding school to explain sightings of a child ghost. Everything she believes unravels as the 'missing' begin to show themselves.
fields.title: The Awakening

fields.plot: After the birth of Renesmee, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.
fields.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2

fields.plot: When wealthy industrialist Tony Stark is forced to build an armored suit after a life-threatening incident, he ultimately decides to use its technology to fight against evil.
fields.title: Iron Man

fields.plot: A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.
fields.title: Oz the Great and Powerful

fields.plot: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.
fields.title: Despicable Me

fields.plot: A series of interconnected short films follows a washed-up producer as he pitches insane story lines featuring some of the biggest stars in Hollywood.
fields.title: Movie 43

fields.plot: After a highly unusual zombie saves a still-living girl from an attack, the two form a relationship that sets in motion events that might transform the entire lifeless world.
fields.title: Warm Bodies

fields.plot: An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.
fields.title: Flight

fields.plot: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries old war between two immortal clans.
fields.title: I, Frankenstein

fields.plot: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.
fields.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation

fields.plot: The Greek general Themistocles battles an invading army of Persians under the mortal-turned-god, Xerxes.
fields.title: 300: Rise of an Empire

fields.plot: A meek hobbit of The Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.
fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

fields.plot: Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.
fields.title: Red 2

fields.plot: With the 70s behind him, San Diego's top rated newsman, Ron Burgundy, returns to take New York's first 24-hour news channel by storm.
fields.title: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues

fields.plot: In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.
fields.title: Dredd

fields.plot: The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been kidnapped by Gargamel since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation - creatures called the Naughties - into real Smurfs.
fields.title: The Smurfs 2

fields.plot: Rescued from the outrageous neglect of his aunt and uncle, a young boy with a great destiny proves his worth while attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
fields.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

fields.plot: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.
fields.title: 21 Jump Street

fields.plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.
fields.title: The Shining

fields.plot: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin in the woods, where they get more than they bargained for. Together, they must discover the truth behind the cabin in the woods.
fields.title: The Cabin in the Woods

fields.plot: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.
fields.title: Turbo

fields.plot: Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.
fields.title: The Lone Ranger

fields.plot: The story of Linda Lovelace, who is used and abused by the porn industry at the behest of her coercive husband, before taking control of her life.
fields.title: Lovelace

fields.plot: In New York City, a crime lord's right-hand man is seduced by a woman seeking retribution.
fields.title: Dead Man Down

fields.plot: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.
fields.title: Moneyball

fields.plot: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after narrowly escaping a bizarre accident.
fields.title: Donnie Darko

fields.plot: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman, mechanic and getaway driver lands himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor.
fields.title: Drive

fields.plot: Two salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital age find their way into a coveted internship at Google, where they must compete with a group of young, tech-savvy geniuses for a shot at employment.
fields.title: The Internship

fields.plot: Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. Whilst MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.
fields.title: Skyfall

fields.plot: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.
fields.title: Mean Girls

fields.plot: The rivalry between two magicians becomes more exacerbated by their attempt to perform the ultimate illusion.
fields.title: The Prestige

fields.plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caretaker.
fields.title: Intouchables
